3061001.Content:
With a crisp snap, the chest opens. But inside is no treasure-just a note:
What isn't yours will eventually vanish.

3061101.Content: Not long after, Pell finished checking the gear in her backpack and explained how to use it to Phyllis. Phyllis taught Pell the secrets of fishing.

10010401.Content:
The Man in Black disappeared into the Void Engram.
By the time I regained consciousness, I was already back in reality.

30015301.Content:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.

30070801.Content: Moved the heavy Golem elsewhere with the other scavengers in the camp...

30070802.Content: Some time later, 6 people in black appeared in sight...

30070803.Content:
Huskstar's right hand lifted instantly, and a miniature Legacy flew from his hand.
The Legacy arced gracefully through the air and landed near the place where the Golem was hidden.
But aside from a noticeable arc of electricity, nothing else happened...

17100106.Content:
The engine rumbled as the ship slowly departed the Port of Asterleeds.
Along the way, stars twinkled in the night sky, jellyfish glowed faintly in the Abyssal, and seagulls circled and cried above the stern.

As the sky began to lighten, an island came into view.
Connor gave the order to halt. We lowered the lifeboats and rowed toward the misty island.

17100112.Content:
On the return journey, the sea mist still hadn't cleared.

The island slowly faded into the thick fog behind us as if it had never existed.

In the distance, the Port of Asterleeds appeared in the morning light.

Figures moved on the dock, and as the ropes were thrown ashore, I looked back at the sea.
The mist still hung low, and that island had long since vanished into the deep blue.

17100114.Content:
Some time later, Connor sent word through someone:
"The island construction is roughly completed. You may visit for inspection when available.
Just show your Ocean Platinum Card to the staff at the dock. "

17100301.Content:
Some time later, the architectural artisans arrived on the island with various tools and swiftly began work.
Under Connor's supervision, the house expansion was completed in a very short time.

17100401.Content: The architectural artisans once again modified the house...

17100501.Content:
Under Connor's supervision,
the artisans efficiently completed the first phase of island expansion...

17100601.Content:
The artisans worked with great ease...
The second phase of construction was also smoothly completed.

17100701.Content:
Having fully grasped the process, the artisans completed the final expansion just as smoothly.
Connor high-fived each artisan who helped build the island...
Now, every part of the island is fully accessible.
